page.title: 05WESTERLEIGH GENERAL STORES
page.content: The{shop}has been owned and run by the same{family}for 55 years.Most of the{customers live locally}but because it is on a busy road it collects a lot of{passing trade}as well. Saturdays and Tuesdays tend to be the busiest. Tuesdays are busy because that is when {pensions}are paid out.Most of the custom is for bread, milk, fruit, vegetables and small items of grocery. Lots of children come in for chocolate and ice creams. The shop is also a{sub- post-office.} All of the family is allowed to serve stamps and deal with other post-office business but the owner himself, being trained specially to be the sub- postmaster, is in charge and deals with all the accounts.
